I'll leave screenshots here for you to draw your own conclusions, thank you if anyone who knows Japanese correct me if I'm wrong, I accept criticism with an open heart 😁 IMGUR with prints of the translations - https://imgur.com/a/JUBFzDD - MORE REFERENCES, Japanese version: https://nhentai.net/g/346589/209/ - NON-ORIGINAL VERSION?! https://nhentai.net/g/314351/ - once again feel free to criticize or address a mistake I made ok? 😊

Guys, I used google translator app, in my method I got specific pages that had very big differences in their sentences from each translated version and compared them with the original material, I can't assume 100% that I'm right because it's not an organic translation, but clearly this version here retains the original material, as for example in the other translation page 24 where she says "wished that i could have... given my virginity" this translation makes the sentence much more assertive than it actually is, in the original the girl just says "i wanted to give you", do you see the big difference in this? in this one right here se said "i was saving my first time for you" something much closer to the original given the context that I'll explain soon, which is what made me believe 100% in this translation here. page 11 of the other version the girl says "i've never really liked the smell and taste of semen" & "and yet..." SHE NEVER SAID THAT, she just says "the taste of semen" &...

- The "This is... sex" monologue at p17: Not as major as the top one, could prolly mean smth like "this is how sex with him feels like"

Not virgin:
- There isn't blood. Sure it is a huge factor but said by many including these dudes at the bottom explained how you can tore your hymen without sex. 
- The femdom at the beggining showing signs of experience. Kinda minor for me. 
- How slutty she looks. Love me some sluts ngl.

Ok, as someone that knows Japanese (still learning btw) i will give you all some explanations.

Its implicit that she is VIRGIN, why? At page 17 she says -this is...sex- wich is quite ambiguous but in japanese セックスこんなだったっけ  can be translate like -so, this is how sex is- implying that se has never experienced sex before.

At page 19 when she put his penis inside of her she says -i dont really know (how to do this)- Also you can se her struggling a little after he inserted his penis, look closer and you will notice that through various panels.
Finally her dialog in japanese at page 24 clearly states that she hasnt have sex before, ever.
As for everything written before i can assure that she was virgin with a 99.9999% of certainty.

Btw, there is other translation of this hentai but i can assure that that translation is for some reason messed up, this one is way better and accurated. Sorry for my english, isnt my native language.

This a shoujo manga feel make mi gone to 7/10. Enjoyable for a spent some free time while lookin some BL. xD

@thebeesknees

She's a hoe tho. She was sleeping around trying to forget about her first love. There have been several hints in the dialogues to point that out.

1. Slide number 1 - she said he is the only man who rejected her in her life, meaning that the other guys took her for a spin.
2. Slide 5 in another translation , her phone rings and she asks herself "Who is going to be the next one to comfort her after wasting all her newyears money.
3. Slide 11, she states that she never really liked the taste or smell of semen, which means she already both smelled and tasted it before.
4.  Slides 17+ she keeps wondering why sex feels so good with him, it never felt like this.
5. Slide 24 she tells him that nobody has ever made her feel this good, he is the first to.
6. Slide 24 she is crying while telling him that she also always wished to give him his virginity but that never happened apparently.

She ain't a virgin but has never enjoyed it with other guys. I know it puts a damper in some guys moods, bit it's 2020 now and the thought of love having to be pure is outdated. I mean if I am to get myself a girlfriend now, unless she's really meek or is the shy type, I wouldn't count on her being a virgin
That being said, I do not know Japanese so she could be a virgin or not. I cannot find out unless some Japanese dude, someone who knows the language well, or the author clarifies.

I believe either translation could be correct. She could be virgin, but she could have also slept with other guys to forget about him. About the issue about the lack of blood, Simon doesn't bother to draw blood from the breaking of hymens in his doujins. For example, in his doujin "Little Maid" the heroine Anri is a virgin yet there is no blood once she got penetrated. This author usually doesn't bother drawing blood, but instead he just tells the reader if they were a virgin through exposition or expression (i.e. having her shake in pain.) Honestly, I believe plotwise that it would be better if she wasn't a virgin as it would fit the title better. If she lost her virginity but fell in love with her first love again, it would be a "Re:First Love." However, the same concept can work if she was a virgin and she just tried to forget about him. For fap material, I would prefer if she was a virgin because it would feel more hygienic to fap to, but the plot would be fine either way. 8/10
